original_text: Exhort servants to be obedient unto their own masters, and to please them well in all things; not answering again;
korean_text: 종들은 자기 상전들에게 범사에 순종하여 기쁘게 하고 거슬러 말하지 말며

sentences.original_text: to be obedient unto their own masters
and to please them well in all things
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 모든 일에 그들을 잘 기쁘게 하라
